page.topic: Alpha Five Printer is not Installed
page.description: The Amyuni printer driver can fail during the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installation. Check the Amyuni installer log to find out more information.

section.description: The Amyuni printer is distributed as part of the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS. It is used to generate Reports. If the Amyuni printer fails to install, you cannot create Reports using Alpha Anywhere. This may manifest as an error message when you try to create a Report:

figure.title: Error message sent from the Report server if the Amyuni printer driver is missing

link.alt: Report did not print. Error reported was: 'Alpha Five Printer' (for creating PDF, RTF and HTMl output) is not installed. Re-install Alpha Anywhere Appication Server for IIS at line: 31

section.description: If an error occured during the Amyuni installation, the error details can be found in the *[installAmyuniPrinters.log]* file. If an error occured during the installation of the Amyuni priner, it will be listed in the installAmyuniPrinters.log file:

description.p: The Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installer will notify you that an error occured and details on where to find the installAmyuniPrints.log file.
If the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installer is not running in silent mode, the IIS installer will display this message as a popup dialog:

figure.title: Error installing Amyuni printer driver while installing Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS

link.alt: Error Configuring Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS. An unexpected error occurred while installing AmyUni printer driver.

description.p: If the installer for Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS is run in silent mode, the error will be logged to the Windows Event log instead.

Some older versions of the Alpha Anywhere Application Server for IIS installer will not notify you if the Amyuni installion failed. You can, however, still check the installAmyuniPrinters.log file for installation errors. You can find the *[installAmyuniPrinters.log]* inside the *[Amyuni5]* folder in the installation directory. For example, *[bold:C:\Program Files (x86)\A5V12 Application Server for IIS\Amyuni5]*.

section.description: If an unsigned printer driver was installed prior to installing the Amyuni Printer driver, the Amyuni installer will fail with an "Error Code: 87 Invalid Parameter" error. As *[extlink:Amyuni explains on their website@https://www.amyuni.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2824]*:

"During installation the Microsoft certified printer driver, the Windows operating system copies and renames the amyuni.inf file and related printer driver files to the %system32%\DriverStore\FileRepository folder. Under some situations, Windows fails to copy the .inf file because of previous installations, mainly if the previous installation was for an unsigned printer driver. When installing a new version of the printer driver, the error 87 Invalid Parameters appears."

Before attempting to reinstall the Amyuni printer, the DriverStore\FileRepository folder needs to be cleaned up. For more information about this error and how to resolve it, follow the instructions detailed on Amyuni's website, *[extlink:Invalid Parameters installing PDF Converter printer driver@https://www.amyuni.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2824]*.
